mapper.select: select board_no as boardNo,nickname as "memberVO.nickName", time_posted as timePosted,title,hits,likes from (select row_number() over(order by board.board_no) as rnum,board.board_no,member.nickname, to_char(board.time_posted,'YYYY.MM.DD') as time_posted,review.title,review.hits,review.likes from board board,review review,member member where board.board_no=review.board_no and board.id=member.id) where rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber}

select board_no as boardNo,nickname as "memberVO.nickName", time_posted as timePosted,title,hits,likes from (select row_number() over(order by board.board_no) as rnum,board.board_no,member.nickname, to_char(board.time_posted,'YYYY.MM.DD') as time_posted,review.title,review.hits,review.likes from board board,review review,member member where board.board_no=review.board_no and board.id=member.id and review.title=#{keyword}) where rnum between #{pb.startRowNumber} and #{pb.endRowNumber}

select board_no as boardNo,nickname as "memberVO.nickName", time_posted as timePosted,title,hits,likes from (select row_number() over(order by board.board_no) as rnum,board.board_no,member.nickname, to_char(board.time_posted,'YYYY.MM.DD') as time_posted,review.title,review.hits,review.likes from board board,review review,member member where board.board_no=review.board_no and board.id=member.id and member.nickname=#{keyword}) where rnum between #{pb.startRowNumber} and #{pb.endRowNumber}
mapper.insert:
select board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into board(board_no,id,content,time_posted) values(#{boardNo},#{memberVO.id},#{content},sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from board board,review review where board.board_no=review.board_no and review.title=#{value}
select count(*) from board board,review review,member member where board.board_no=review.board_no and member.nickname=#{value} and board.id=member.id

select r.board_no,b.id,m.nickname,to_char(b.time_posted,'YYYY.MM.DD HH:mm:ss') as time_posted, r.hits,r.likes,b.content,r.title from board b,review r,member m where b.id=m.id and b.board_no=r.board_no and r.board_no=#{value}
mapper.update: update review set hits=hits+1 where board_no=#{value}
update review set likes = likes+1 where board_no = #{boardNo}
